title: integration ! will it be integral part ??
content: Heyy i skipped integration in class 12 and know v basic things abt it so how hard will math and shld i start learning Integration from now so to ease up my first year pls tell

comments.body:
Yes it will be an "integral" part

You are doing engineering ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

It's math heavy, good luck
🙂🙂 I guess i will lay My ass and  practice integration
How did you skip such a huge topic??
I didn't completely skip it , due to this year's huge increase in number of questions i focused on other topics else than integration and managed maths 🙂

You are my twin♥️. I literally shat my pants when the Chancellor said that something's wrong with you if you don't get any of the mentioned 4 scholarship/grants. Pivoted on Physics Chem and got myself a CS seat. Hope we'll do well🫂

1st sem math will mainly be differential calculus with some integration and 2nd sem is integral calculus. You'll use integration in other subjects too like physics and mechanics,  but the actual integration process wont be that complex as jee sums
Ohhh thank u so much for the info
